name: Dashwalk Dueling
description: Dashwalk Dueling is a minimalist 2D platform fighter. Its simple mechanics and visuals are the foundation for complex ground movement, creative combo routes, and fast-flowing combat! Choose from eight supers and reversals to dismantle the competition.

name: Rakuten
description: Rakuten is a physics based space shooter where you pilot your own rocketship, shoot down enemy spacecraft, and unlock upgrades to further increase your capabilities and available weaponry.

name: Blink Planets
description: Blink Planets is a strategy puzzle game where you pioneer a wasteland planet into a settleable home for people. The colorful "BASE" symbolizes the resource needed to develop a planet. Place "BLOCKS" to secure further land. Explore more planets to continue welcoming migrants.

name: In Shape 2
description: In this minimalistic arcade game, you have to move and reshape your figure to match the passing figures.

name: Hyper Catch
description: Hyper Catch is a fast paced multiplayer catch game. You only win when you touch your opponent. You will receive weapons and other tools to improve your chances to win. This is not a typical shooter game! The worlds are completely destructible and the players are regenerated by nano-bots.

name: Astral Space
description: Have you ever controlled a game without using a keyboard or a mouse? Yes, This is possible. We have developed a Artificial Intelligence-based game that gives you the ability to control the ball's movement and directions via hand movements, the challenge is to gain as many points as possible.

name: Galactic Federation
description: Classical 3D space combat simulation with unique 100% dynamic destruction engine, allows you to realistically damage and burn through your enemies exactly where you hit them with blasters, causing their onboard systems and armor to melt away and fall apart. Made by solo developer.

name: Team Ice Cream VR
description: Play alone in VR—or get together with a friend on PC and work as a team—to attract and serve customers ice cream. Earn tips to buy upgrades and outfits and move up in the world!

name: The Midnight Wind
description: The Midnight Wind is a sarcastic single-player pixel art RPG following the story of four hosts of the souls of a dead star. The story loosely takes place in Indonesia, where players will embark on a bare-bones journey to protect themselves and their people.

name: The Atlas Mystery: A VR Puzzle Game
description: Explore the haunted halls of the infamous Atlas Theater, a 1940’s era movie palace that played host to a shocking Hollywood tragedy. Solve intricate puzzles, discover startling artifacts, and evade sinister forces to uncover the twisted truth behind the theater’s dark history.

name: Oasis: Dark Forest
description: Darkness rules the land. Defend your holy tree. Plant trees to defeat the ghost army. Explore and collect resources in a randomly generated forest world. Upgrade your technology tree. You are the light in the darkness.

name: Hidden Beast
description: Hidden Beast is a strategy game, similar to chess and an old board game called Combat. The player moves his army towards static totems that, when confronted, turn into beasts. In the clash, the stronger piece defeats the weaker one and removes it from the scene.

name: Delta Zero
description: A fast-paced action platformer with non-linear world progression and level design! Challenging gameplay with 3 difficulty modes, 2 playable characters and local co-op! Fight bosses in any order and experience the world change with each victory, enemies become harder, faster and smarter!

name: Worlds Builder
description: WORLDS Builder is game about alchemy, controlling forces of nature, creating worlds, building, researching and trading! Create new lands, mountains and forests, build houses, farms and workshops, discover new technologies. Start with a small mining village and grow it into a rich city!

name: A Gift of War
description: A Gift of War is a role playing game about a young man going on a mission to assist his country's war effort against the bordering enemy. It features simultaneous turn-based combat akin to a roguelike, but its levels are carefully crafted by hand.

name: Power Pushout
description: Power Pushout is an epic turn-based asian-style strategy game with martial arts elements. Choose your warrior and master figures and fight with them in a wild battle to rule over the game board. Either you throw your opponent off the board or you conquer the opposing towers to win the game.

name: Lost Contact
description: LOST CONTACT is an exciting realistically designed space station shooter. As the main character of unflinching Nil Heard you will experience soul grabbing horrors of facing the mutant monsters of the Universe.

name: This & Cats
description: Managing a small shop is cool, but it's even cooler when there are cats around! This & Cats is a relaxing first-person life sim in which you earn money by adopting cats and making customers happy.

name: Oppcium
description: A sentient alien organism has escaped its cage and now freely roams a government facility. Silence has engulfed the city as a toxic and unidentified cloud was released from black oily stones. Witness and investigate a dire situation that appears to escalate by the hour.

name: Path to Gaea
description: Path To Gaea is a turn based puzzle-adventure that follows a simple story between good and evil. However, not everything is what is seems.

name: The War Will Win
description: The War Will Win is a classic turn-based strategy game with the added uncertainty and luck of card games. Play the main story with branching storylines, complete side quests, and unlock unique cards with uniques abilities or battle a friend on local-multiplayer.

name: The Last Conquerors
description: Join up with Broaster in an epic journey were you will fight diverse enemies, get to know what happened with the war on Earth and finally, make decisions that could affect Earth’s destiny.

name: Space Depression
description: You must do your best to protect the world! Destroy all enemies. Get the highest score.

name: Uncolored Bob II
description: "Uncolored Bob ii" is a roguelike platformer adventure with randomly generated levels. It has level editor, so you can share challenge with your friends.

name: Willage
description: An interactive series, where the player meets Eastern European culture.

name: Asteroid Force
description: Asteroids are headed directly towards Earth. Destroy asteroids before they can slam into Earth. Earn medallions to purchase ship upgrades to help in the fight to save Earth.

name: Magic Disc Golf
description: Magic Disc Golf lets you take control of your disc and steer it towards the basket. Find the optimal route, navigate challenging terrain, and use your speed boost to cover some extra ground. Choose from three 18-hole courses and four game modes.

name: Speed Creators
description: A high speed multiplayer platformer where each player builds a slice of a sprawling level filled with traps and special blocks to compete and race against each other in a variety of unique game modes.

name: Battlefleet Gust Wind
description: About：The solar system was invaded by aliens of unknown origin. The earth has fallen. As the commander of the surviving space fleet, return to the solar system from outer space and save the earth.

name: Pure Logic
description: Explore logic symbols. Discover the rules. Solve complex puzzles. Conquer all zones. Feel the power of your logical side!

name: Cryweard
description: "Project Ergath" is a single-player action RPG developed by a student, with the focus on tense moments in battles and a feeling of accomplishment in a victory.Enjoy the tense, authentic combat and the sense of accomplishment amplified by the high difficulty level.

name: Rootlash
description: Rootlash takes you on an adventure where you get to play as a living tree! Your home is being threatened by the expansion of humans, wood loggers and miners are destroying your precious home. Take the right into your own hands and fight off the human invaders and reclaim your home forest!

name: Wintertwined
description: When Winter and Giles find themselves stuck in a cabin during a snowstorm, they discover it's horrific history.

name: Roadworks 2
description: City building real time strategy economy simulation game. Manage the resources on the map and build a city connected through road networks of different types of road so that you can meet production targets.

name: Boss of the Mafia
description: Boss Of The Mafia is a side-scrolling game in which you play as the boss of the mafia! In this incredibly difficult platformer you have to get through all the obstacles and dangerous traps in order to complete this game to the end. Cool relaxing jazz music will help you with this!

name: A Space Odyssey
description: This is a VR game, you can travel the solar system through your VR devices in this game, round trip the Sun,venus,mercury,earth,moon,mars,Saturn,Jupiter,Uranus,Feel the shock of the universe。

name: The Hierophant
description: Take on the role of Hero in a humble land where evil has awoken in this simple hand-drawn, Turn-based RPG!

name: Fallout: Miami
description: Fallout: Miami is an upcoming DLC-sized mod for Fallout 4 with an original setting, complete with its own engrossing main quest, interesting side quests and characters, including new companions. The central theme of our story is the struggle between order and freedom. The setting for this new adventure is the post-post-apocalyptic Vacation Wasteland of Miami Beach. Once a popular tourist destination, attracting rich and glamorous visitors both foreign and domestic, it now plays host to an eclectic assortment of factions and societies, each with its own culture and approach to the challenges of this new post-nuclear world. The once-great slaver kingdom of Sunshine Cove has recently come under threat by a horde of automobile-worshipping nomads calling themselves the Nuclear Patriots. While Miami's various factions vie for control over the Vacation Wasteland, a long-forgotten remnant of the old world slumbers beneath the waves, waiting for an opportunity to reclaim America once again.

name: Love Is Dangerous
description: Love Is Dangerous is an action-adventure game featuring simple but flawless platform gameplay, amazing pixel art using modern techniques, engaging and powerful story, charismatic and funny characters, comic-book-style cinematics and lots of love.

name: Popped Up
description: This is like a Pac-Man game on steroids, but as a platformer. Collect all the caps without dying and keep increasing your score. This is a challenging, skill based game. If you're good at this game, then you probably have the perception of an athlete. PLAY FOR FREE ON https://111144447777a.com

name: Eniko: Ghosts of Grace
description: A story-rich action rpg that pays hommage to 90's gaming with it's retro 2.5D pixel art look. Join Livia, a gusty but ambitious young Warrior, in a tale that explores the meaning of family, loyalty, ambition and war. After a fateful encounter, everything Livia believes in will be put to the test.

name: Levenium
description: Levenium, a sci-fi action adventure. Fight, think, craft, hack and puzzle your way to freedom.

name: Cards of Patience
description: Cards of Patience combines solitaire-like gameplay with RPG and roguelite elements. Choose your hero and fight against a variety of enemies by destroying all their cards. Use different levelable spells and equip yourself with powerful items and potions.

name: Blood Bay
description: Blood Bay is a 4-player open-world survival RPG. In a Fabulous Fantasy setting.Which is set on magical islands. Each island is fraught with secrets that you have to reveal!

name: Reborn Tribe
description: Reborn Tribe is a medieval style simulation INDIE GAME developed by one person. In this game, players build houses and hire staffs to run the farms, pastures, etc. You have to encounter a lot difficulties and find out the reason why your tribe disappeared.

name: EbonSide
description: EbonSide is a JRPG with mmo aspects! What does that mean? Well! You can explore the open world of Mest Jest! Get lost in the story about the false Dark champion trying to corrupt the world with a shard of Ebonside! A sword forged by the God of Darkness!

name: The Wrath of the Erlik
description: The Wrath Of The Erlik is a 3d fantasy rpg game based on turkish mythology.

name: Dream Loop
description: The ambient indie adventure. An atmospheric first person lucid dreamscape by The Mad Men of Oopsy Daisy, Inc. "...a deeply emotional audio experience, with an innovative and immersive 'music looping' puzzle system."

name: Cleared Hot
description: CLEARED HOT is a nostalgic helicopter shooter with satisfying physics and light tactical elements. Shoot, dodge, move your squad around the battlefield, and pick up almost anything with your rope and magnet.

name: Twinland
description: Twinland is a Metroidvania set in a kingdom full of weird creatures, dangerous dungeons and powerful artifacts. Explore varied locations, fight numerous bosses – and be on lookout for secrets 'cause they are everywhere!

name: Pity Please!
description: Pity Please! is a homeless mastery game about survival, strategy, exploration, and capitalizing on societal systems while adapting to the vagrant lifestyle! A grid-based, casual survival strategy game with a cartoony 2.5D isometric aesthetic.

name: The Mighty Quest
description: When evil is growing, it’s time to stand your ground and do your Mighty Quest. Fight your way through the hordes of enemies and tricky bosses in the 2D RPG with the elements of platformer

name: Aluminium
description: A virtual reality shooting range with randomly generated targets, obstacles, and a countdown timer.

name: Sin Bearers Tactics
description: Follow the Sin Bearers' adventures, a mercenary group evolving in a fictive near future on Earth, through the 24 maps of this old school tactical game.

name: Impower
description: Impower is a rogue-lite spellcasting platformer. Create powerful spells to defeat any foe.

name: Galactic Chef
description: A sci-fi cooking competition show game with procedurally-generated ingredients and voxel-based cooking simulation - Beat the clock and your opponents through a full season of culinary challenges to win the Galactic Chef title and unlock new game modes and other content!

name: Alcheverse: Shadow from Gladview
description: Alcheverse: Shadow from Gladview is an unique mix of AutoBattler & Crafting games. Explore an ever-changing map, gather strange ingredients and mix them together to craft Alcheverse: powerful creatures born from alchemy! Let them fight for you in strategic automatic battles and save Gladview!

name: Quick Shot
description: Destroy the robots before they kill you!

name: Great Lakes Simulator
description: Great Lakes Simulator... Drive 1-to-1 Scale Lake Freighters On The World Famous Great Lakes!

name: Cyberbugs
description: Cyberbugs is a post apocalyptic twin stick shooter which takes place long after humanity has gone extinct. Insectoids has gained consciousness through the means of cybernetics by previous human experiments and are now having the time of their life. Enter the arena and fight your way out.

name: Mojito Woody's Rescue
description: MOJITO Woody's Rescue puts you on a journey to find your best dog friend Woody, who has been kidnapped by an evil Cucumber, in a cute 3d adventure with sandbox levels, platforming challenges and exploration zones. Inspired by Super Mario 64 - Odyssey / Banjo Kazooie / Celeste

name: Fire in the Beastlands
description: An old-school 2D sidescrolling action RPG soulslike metroidvania influenced by the greats of the past!

name: Bad Way
description: Bad Way is an action adventure game in the style of TPS.History professor Michael Wayne hadn't yet realised the trouble he was getting into when he got the call. This unexpected trouble that he didn't plan at all would drag him into an adventure that he could never imagine.

name: Metal Hunter
description: Top-down 3D shoot 'em up game in which you play as a robot that fights for survival against other robots. Your only goal is to kill all your enemies until you are the last one standing.

name: Fey: Distant Daydream
description: An old mansion, a mysterious letter, a box of old memorabilia. Explore the present and past to uncover the secrets of the extraordinary family that lived here. Remember a time long gone as you set foot in this late 1990s-inspired mystery with intricate puzzles and eccentric characters.

name: Ending Way
description: Chapter 2 is now here waiting for you. With horrible creatures and things you can do to get out. But ... beware of Adi

name: Split Drive
description: Split Drive is a roguelite arena shooter where you have to find your way home through a hostile galaxy, numerous locations and a variety of bosses, all generated procedurally.

name: Crystal Venture
description: Crystal Venture is a voxel based adventure game with a focus on exploration and survival. The whole world around you is uniquely generated and fully editable. Build impressive castles, fight monsters, or go through quests, the game fits many gaming styles, is moddable and multiplayer.

name: Robert Robie and the Idols of Jade
description: Hilarious adventure game in cartoon style. Robert Robie receives a mysterious assignment while hiding from the police in a cheap motel in Mexico.

name: BallRoll
description: Experience metaphorical descent into the land of darkness and then back to the light.

name: Three Dimension
description: Is your life normal?Explore the world with three protagonists and uncover the hidden secrets of this ordinary yet unusual world!

name: George: A Horror Story
description: While out on a relaxing hike in the woods, George loses his bearing and finds himself lost in the mountains. He now has one goal. Finding a way back to civilization and safety, and escaping the dangers of these lands.

name: Ballad of Ba'al
description: An atmospheric tabletop, turn-based strategy roguelike about passing trials of the afterlife and ascending from eternal purgatory. Endure your depraved company through grim sacrifices, cryptic riddles, and oblivion’s ever-changing labyrinth all through an interpretive, minimalistic style.

name: MMA Championship
description: MMA Championship is a mixed martial arts fighting game

name: Oftalmogarden
description: Oftalmogarden is a fast and chaotic roguelike sci-fi eyeball monster shooting game. Shoot your way through hordes of enemies, collect upgrades, weapons, and gadgets to grow stronger, but accumulate curses over time. Speed is your best ally to survive, the sky is watching and death will not wait.

name: Aplestia: Retold
description: Follow the steps of Britton, Summer, Sover and Marina, a team of four rookie adventurers that went on their first ever S Class Quest! Aplestia:Retold is the remade version of the 2017 game and offers double the content, more side quests, stages and much much more!

name: Whiskey Bravo
description: A sci-fi strategy board game, where nerdy dice rolls determine the outcome of battle. Command your Spider Cannon and zany troops in a turn-based tactics game that plays like a cross between Advance Wars and Warhammer.

name: Gun to Colonists
description: An epic platform fighter for up to 4 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room

name: Zarktor's Realm
description: Zarktor's Realm is a beautiful open-world RPG adventure inspired by Skyrim. Explore medieval England on horseback, uncover Arthurian legends, battle hordes of undead, gather and upgrade.

name: This is Timmy
description: While searching for his own path, home service robot Timmy finds himself trapped. Face deadly and challenging puzzles to find your way to freedom.

name: Space Waves
description: Space Waves is a procedurally generated 2D arcade style shooter with multiple collectable power ups and varying enemy types. This game will casually draw you in and then increase the pace and difficulty as you progress through the never ending levels.

name: Little Sparks
description: A puzzle game about fireflies

name: Empires of the Void II
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy game. A faithful digital rendition of the beloved board game, Empires of the Void II.

name: Kill The Monster Z
description: Kill The Monster Z is a pixel-style, side-scrolling action game where you play The role of The main character, trying to destroy what you see as enemies, but it's not that easy.

name: A Christmas Story From Hell VR
description: CHOKE ON A GAS STATION HOT DOG. GET SENT TO HELL. MAKE A DEAL WITH ST PETER. RIP AND TEAR HORDES OF DEMONIC PRESENTS IN ETERNAL DAMNATION. DEFEAT LUCIFER HIMSELF. Enjoy your Christmas. . . IN HELL.

name: Nios
description: NIOS is a futuristic anti gravity obstacle racing game arcade where you run along a point to point paths in a open world map. Get your best score overtaking the greatest number of opponents in sequences without hit them. P.S. Remember to follow the green arrow otherwise you could get lost. :-)

name: Enraged
description: Deck the halls with bullets and elf-matter in this high-octane 2D melee-shooter where you embark on a mission to put an end to Santa's sweatshop

name: Spruce
description: Create the perfect community for your town of wizards. Forge weapons and defensive towers in preparation for the onslaught of monsters - and pray you survive.

name: The Flea Evolution: Bugaboo
description: Relive The Flea or experience it for the first time in The Flea Evolution, a skill and ingenuity game where you have to guide the flea through a maze of intricate caverns. Your mission is to find the exit jumping between the different platforms, but be careful not to get eaten by the enemies!

name: Project Delta
description: Explore all possible realities as you try and save the multiverse from the Darkness in this unique Procedural Meta-Metroidlike Adventure.

name: Play Outside Simulator
description: Play Outside is a game in which you can do your favorite activities ... on your PC! (without really going outside).

name: Sniperpunk
description: Sniperpunk is an epic arena shooter where every bullet ricochets. Duel players online or locally in high-octane casual or ranked 1v1 matches. Outplay opponents with 4 punk-themed characters, each with unique weapons and abilities. And it's free! Bring your friends and ricochet your way to victory!

name: Alchera
description: Alchera A Struggle for Life steward in an alternate universe, sees a portal at the end of the cave during an operation, wondering and approaching the steward. He enters the portal and finds himself in an age where god and his soldiers rule the earth, his goal is to find the portal and save himself.

name: Baptism of Fire
description: What at first was just another ranger duty, becomes the duty of champions trusted to protect the whole country's safety. In a race against time and against the former Champion Jorgen, Zasker and his party must secure all three Volgaia Shards to save the country from total ruin.

name: Consume Thy Flesh: The Pumpkin Smashing Sim
description: A bite-sized physics based Halloween hootenanny! Players must roll their gargantuan gourd to blood-thirsty rug-rats below, so they may dine on your candy packed insides. Maintain momentum, catch some sick air, and splatter your insides all over. The ravenous spirits of Samhain must be satiated.

name: Floor is...What!?
description: Floor is...What!? doesn't just mean floor is lava! Experience 4 player mini game mayhem with 50+ games set in a snow filled frozen tundra, hungry shark infested waters, low gravity moon base, and more while customizing your characters with over 100 unlockable costumes!

name: Timothy: Shinpi no Mori
description: Sin descripción

name: Jump10000
description: Jump and collect coins to upgrade your slime's jumping power! If the jumping power increases, you will be able to collect more and more coins! Remember! Your goal is to reach 100 floor!

name: Bingiman: Trap Ochido
description: BINGIMAN: Trap Ochido is a fast paced , boomer shooter inspired video game with a sinister African aesthetic feel through its voodoo and gunplay art direction.

name: Seventh Angel
description: Seventh Angel is a surreal psychological first person horror game of a man on the brink of absolute madness. Questioning the veracity of blurred memories and hallucinations, and discovering the lies within himself. Stunning graphics, intense action and masterful storytelling. Experience the madness.

name: Balls and Dungeons
description: Challenging spatial puzzle platformer. Open walls and put the balls in the holes. Requires logic and tactics to complete. Lots of levels with increasing complexity. Relaxing and ambient gameplay. How deep can you get?

name: Crops and Conveyors
description: Crops and Conveyors is a cozy game about building an automated farm. Enjoy the satisfying progression of starting from scratch, gathering resources, earning money and growing your farm.

name: Dungeon's Fall
description: Face the hardest and longest Dungeon ever made. Use power-ups, to increase difficulty or make it easier.

name: The House Before
description: A narrative adventure game where you play as a house filled with strange creatures.

name: Bionic Shield: Battle for Space Nebula Omega
description: In this 2D twin-stick shooter you fly your spaceship, fight in epic space battles, discover new planets, invade new terrain, avoid traps, dodge bullets, customize your weapons and shoot your way through hordes of enemies. A different experience every time you play.

name: Rebirth-Land of Zombies
description: This is a zombie shooting game, you can experience high-precision guns, grenades, and real environmental effects

name: Ani Leaving Sirius
description: A dying planet in energy chaos, dangerous districts and challenging combats. Your only chance to escape the planet is through inconsistent portal! Gain energy crystals by slaying enemies. Improve your abilities and acquire drones. Complete your escape quest in this challenging rouge-lite gameplay.

name: Ice sugar
description: Ice sugar is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level. 100 levels. 5 musical compositions. Varied bonus.

name: VR Sky Walk
description: "VR Sky Walk" is a simple VR immersive game that opens a different door for you who love thrills.

name: Tzakol in Exile
description: Turn-based roguelite with procedural generation. You can choose an adventure for a short run or for a long exploration.

name: Ekoh Beach
description: Ekoh Beach is where you spent the best vacations of your childhood: golden sandy beaches, awesome arcades, zen tranquility and friendly faces. You have answered the call to return to Ekoh Beach once again and return its former glory with your building skills.

name: Adventure Fitness VR
description: Challenge yourself on this VR fitness game! Run, climb, and zipline through a diverse set of environment using arm swing controls and then get through high intensity workout stations ranging from battle ropes, archery, boxing, and more. It's a bit like running a VR triathlon.

name: Falconet
description: Falconet is a retro-style twin stick shooter with smooth weapon switching and quick reaction gameplay. Travel through unique levels, solve puzzles, and use your diverse arsenal of weapons to efficiently eliminate an army of rogue machines, rescue human survivors, and rack up high scores.

name: Rouge Patrol
description: A harrowing exploration of the gun-girl trope that doesn't look away once the trigger has been pulled. In this fully-voiced visual novel/ stat raiser you will lead a unit of child soldiers into a deadly war of attrition where your every choice carries the weight of their survival.

name: Shattered Gardens
description: Shattered Gardens is the all-new Open-World, Fantasy RPG!

name: Ooze Redux
description: A NES hard game, made to run and play on original hardware. Ported to the PC. 7 hard and unique levels. An original gripping ChipTune sound track! 8 bit glory in this side scrolling shooter platformer!

name: Halloween Night
description: You play the role of Henry as a child and experience the terror that befell him 20 years earlier on Halloween. The game consists of 4 chapters, each of them is a separate day in the life of a 6-year-old henry. Will you end the game with a Good or Bad Ending? It Depends On You.

name: Traveler Bird
description: An adventurous bird that travels to different places.

name: IllusionCircle
description: IllusionCircle is a unique and very interesting game, and you will be deeply shocked by it.Make you believe that the world is not real. You will find it very difficult to get a higher score. You need to challenge your limits.It's a good choice to give it as a gift to your friends this Christmas.

name: Kingdom Traveler
description: A survival exploration game where you can explore islands, challenge various monsters and defeat powerful Bosses. Craft various weapons and items, place items, grow vegetables and fruits, and trade with merchants. Set sail in the harbor, encounter pirates, monsters and random events in the sea.

name: Suber Driver
description: Complete different driving missions as a taxi or private taxi driver and pick your favorite car from a selection of over 15 amazing vehicles, with tons of customizations.

name: Don't Kill the King!
description: Play as a medieval guard who has to interrogate visitors and search them for potential contraband. Allow the visitors into the city, or throw them into the dungeon. The choice is yours. But be careful, any one of the visitors could be disguised as the assassin and try to take the king's life, again.

name: Ukiyo
description: Ukiyo is a story-based adventure game set in cyberspace. You control the main character Kai, a samurai cat, as he explores the cyberspace. Enjoy a unique world that combines Japanese art style and cyberpunk.

name: Cheeky Princess
description: Princess Ida is a proud student of the Royal Academy of Heroes but her father returned from the war and decided to arrange his daughter's personal life. How will his gamble turn out?

name: Little Island
description: Little Island offers you the experience of interacting with a variety of cute animals in a VR space. Dive into a world full of nature and adorable animal children. You will be healed by interacting with the lively animals. Help them in their time of need, play with them, and love them.

name: Jaws & Claws
description: Jaws & Claws combines elements of platformer, beat'em up, fighter, gunfires, sports competiotions and adventures in a world full of crazy creatures. Waste no time and jump in the fire to the sounds of hard'n'heavy.

name: Vividerie
description: Run, shoot, dash and magic your way through hordes of vile creatures in various procedurally generated dungeons. Combine items in countless ways and master each character – all while discovering secret places and finding out more about the enchanted world of Vividerie.

name: Bomberpet
description: Bomberpet is a game about bombers who like to blow up everything in their way. Blow up, collect power-ups and win.

name: Potato Party: The Potatomancer
description: Potato Party: The Potatomancer is a competitive party platformer in which potatoes in mech suits compete in an array of head-to-head arena challenges to crown a victor, who can turn the laws of nature against their opponents. Try the beta!

name: Mastodonte
description: Mastodonte is an innovative Shoot 'Em Up with the unique mechanics of swapping the view from Vertical to Horizontal scrolling. Sometimes optional, sometimes necessary, but it creates a new experience for each retry.

name: Graffiti Cozy
description: Graffiti Cozy - open-world 3D-platformer where you can explore city with jetpack, bomb graffiti spots and chill out with bouncy hip-hop soundtrack - and all of that at toy-like smooth vibes.

name: Where Stars Belong
description: A short narrative exploration game where you become a Neural Diver Assistant somewhere in the furure. Explore the depth of a corrupted mind by patient S02, talk to thoughts to get hints about the patients life and solve mental puzzles. Uncover the hidden truth layer by layer.

name: Witherholme
description: Witherholme is a co-op (1-4 player) survival horror game where players take on the role of a young goblin magi. Scavenge for clues, discover new spells, and use your trusty staff to light the way through a cursed village.

name: Tale of Serendipity
description: A game of suspense and adventure, where you will take the role of Carla in search of her feline lost by a seemingly harmless people

name: Era of Combat: Boxing
description: Era of Combat: Boxing is a multiplayer VR experience that strives to reward physical and martial prowess. Grab a friend, or a complete stranger, and face-off for a heart-pumping, head-thumping good time! Make 'em sweat!

name: Wonky Works!
description: Unite the fellas and fight for freedom!

name: Dream Storm
description: FPS Multiplayer Team Deathmatch game.

name: Sky Harrier: Alpha Code
description: Single player on rails shooter featuring aerial combat, nostalgic nods to classic arcade shmups, synthwave inspired aesthetics and a vibe to take you straight to the 1980s.

name: Feyght
description: A Small Village Builder / Survival Game. Your villages are under attack! Collect resources, build up towns, defences and prepare small armies to survive.

name: Near Site
description: Near Site is a survival horror game where you are severely near sighted. Over come your visual handicap, solve puzzles, gather clues, and evade predators as you adventure the wilds.

name: Syncope
description: Syncope is a metroidvania with an intricate plot that will immerse you in an adventurous journey through a fascinating world.

name: Please Duology
description: A compilation of two slow-paced, cosmic horror walking simulators, to be completed in under an hour. Please makes you maintain a power station and ignore the noises from the main engine, while Please Follow has you explore the trenches of a losing war, exposing your mind to visions of another world.

name: Socialize
description: If you're a fan of Altis life, DarkRP, GTAV RP and more, Socialize is the multiplayer role-playing game you've been waiting for! Join a unique community that will fit your vision of roleplaying in this endless living world and write your own story with no limits!

name: Castlepoint
description: Castlepoint, an immersive fantasy & medieval strategy game similar to chess and old-style action-based real time strategy games. Conquer enemy areas, without allowing them to enter yours!

name: Irongate Arena
description: Build a formidable team of fighters, healers, and magical warriors while battling your way from village to village in turn based combat. Command your men and take vengeance on those who murdered your father, uphold his legacy, and slay your way to glory!

name: Can You Escape
description: A physics based puzzle, clicker & small automation game. Figure out how to escape, because no-one is coming to help you...

name: Food Poppers
description: A Cutely drawn clicker game.

name: Neura Mechanicus
description: Neura Mechanicus is a turn-based squad tactics game where you operate robot squads in tournaments, each with unique abilities, upgrades and different game mechanics. Enter a cyberpunk world full of strange homemade robots and challenging teams vying to be the best at tournaments.

name: Concerto on White
description: Rhythm Action? No, this is MUSICIAN SIMULATION!

name: Taoist Priest Yan
description: Taoist Priest Yan is a 3D RPG game. Players will play a famous Exorcist. There are many tombs in this forest. Darkness gives birth to many demons and ghosts. They haunt at night, lure and kill pedestrians and eat their blood and body. Yan Chixia heard about it and came here to destroy them.

name: Chicken Empire: Weasel in Shadows
description: Turn-based stealth strategy game, where you try to infiltrate the Chicken Empire bases looking for clues that will help find your friend, the Frog who has been missing since the last chicken raid. Throughout your journey, you will uncover many secrets, and maybe even more than you wanted to know!

name: Hunt Souleater
description: Hunt Souleater is a PvPvE third-person shooter that 60 players are devided into hunter and souleater camps. Hunters besiege the Stramon Island where souleaters haunt to kill the souleaters and destroy the temple.

name: The Cow Game
description: The Cow Game is a Singleplayer 3D Adventure about a caring mother cow that tries to find her stolen calf in a small Low Poly world. While you are following your calf's voice, you find out about a secret cult and experience strange happenings. Can you save your calf? Your child is waiting for you.

name: Crypto Tycoon
description: Ever wanted to manage & build your own crypto empire? Trade crypto and invest into new properties to expand your business.

name: Hidden Histories: The Principality
description: Over sixty hidden object scenes themed around a fictional European country. 100% hidden objects, no narrative story, no adventure, no puzzles, just objects to find.

name: Layerworld
description: Solve each level, layer by layer, as the ghosts of your deaths stack up.

1919. Saboteurs organised an insolent provocation in revolutionary Novgorod. So called «miracle-making» relics of Saint Lukian were stolen right on the eve of being exposed and debunked in public. Our paper «The Red Case» is following the investigation.

name: Songs of Glimmerwick
description: Become immersed in a musical woodland fantasy world where casting a spell is as easy as playing a song. Attend classes, grow the university garden, make friends with classmates and townsfolk, and explore the island’s many oddities and mysteries in this story-driven witch academy RPG.

name: Our Mother's house
description: Our mother`s house is a survival, exploration, puzzle horror game with randomly generated events. Try to survive the night by using different items and exploring your mother`s childhood house. But be careful as many shadows and monster are lurking in the darkness...

name: Survive Lviv
description: Survive Lviv is an old school FPS where you need to survive a horde of Soviet robots, ghouls, and wizards in order to eliminate the Soviet overlord. The game takes place in a post nuclear Ukraine in the year 1991.

name: Koru
description: Play as aspiring botanist, Koru, on her journey to Wilder County to start an apprenticeship with the illusive Dr. Linny.

name: Pushy Worm
description: Help daddy worm as he embarks on a puzzle filled adventure to gather fruit for his hungry little family. Solve puzzles using grid-based Sokoban movement, climb fences, balance items on your head, avoid falling on to spikes, do whatever it takes to collect all the fruit and keep those kids happy.

name: Maken-shi Sara
description: One day, Kurose Sara, the leader of the Magic Research Club, runs into Amy the devil and acquires the ability to transform into "Maken-shi", a warrior that fights evil! In order to stop the devils, Maken-shi Sara heads to the dungeons filled with evil beings!

name: Elemental Battlefields
description: Fight solo or team up with friends in this action-packed magic fighting game! To earn diamonds and shards, use your magic and level up! You can also find them around the map in Drop Zones and buy them in the in-game shop. Spend them on learning any new element you choose!

name: Employee A
description: Employee A is a pixel art point-and-click adventure set in the heart of the modern-day high technology industry. Inspired by classic mystery game series like Ace Attorney and Zero Escape, Employee A will test your logic and deduction skills as you investigate the murder mystery that's upturned your life.

name: Kombo King
description: In this Kung Fu beat em' up, you will unleash powerful combos and destructive finishing moves! You are a rogue warrior who vows to avenge his brethren from the Sunless.

name: Castle of Secrets
description: The Castle with Secrets - a game with a deep and mysterious storyline, beautiful 3D graphics, unique gameplay and mechanics, will immerse you in a fairy tale of reality and mystery. How will this fairy tale end? It's your call.

name: Only Society: Arena
description: Only Society Arena is a new MOBA game which players can spend their time with family and friends. Players will play in a third person view with choosing either in team ranger or team rogue to defend each base.

name: Black Room
description: Black Room is a first-person psychological horror game focused on story and experience. What starts as a night in a motel will pull you deep within the human psyche, leaving you grasping for an exit – and not only for yourself.

name: Humankind in a nutshell
description: Humankind in a nutshell is a 4X strategy game based on slot mechanisms. Beginning from the Ancient era, you have to feed your tribe and fight against barbarians, study new technology to develop your nation. Build various types of facilities which will help your nation grow to achieve victory.

name: Devorian: Left Behind
description: Episodic adventure set in a post apocalyptic steampunk world. Explore shattered mechanical islands as Amber, a young engineer, with Monty, her animal companion - struggling to survive in the harsh air filled with soot and smoke, while their village is the only place where life lives on. For now.

name: League Manager 2022
description: Let's be the manager of the E-Sports club! Choose your favorite team and recruit your favorite players. Train them and choose a tactic that suits the personality of the team member and opponent. Make your favorite team win and make it the most prestigious club.

name: Cult of Cards
description: Cult of Cards is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. An evil cult tries to unleash an ancient demon and all that stands between them and the apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

name: Interconnected Stories
description: Decide the fate of our friendly characters through dozens of cards. It's up to you to make their dreams come true or provoke unpredictable stories!

name: Nanny
description: Evil nanny has you locked in her house, but you've discovered a way to break free from her. You have just 7 days to do that.

name: Jingor Sudoku
description: Jingor Sudoku is to fill the number between 1 and 8 in Jingor face with some numbers in accordance with the following rules into the blank nine grid except the middle grid. rule: each number from 1 to 8 can only appear once on each side or edge. The answer to each Jingor Sudoku is unique

name: Stationery Frontier
description: Stationery Frontier is a game that brought your childhood imagination to life. Fly around, dogfight, Pew & POW with your ruler-pen fighter!

name: TileHunter
description: Your goal is to complete all the dungeons without dying and also to complete all the quests and objectives on your way.

name: The Wolf Is Dead
description: Detective work is never easy. When the body of Alexander Wolff is found face down in the pool at a party for the film about his life, there's only one man (well, Fox) for the job. Interrogate suspects, investigate the scene of the crime and reach back in time with your partner, Maxwell Mirror.

name: Bric à Brac
description: Over 50 hidden object scenes. No cooldown but limited hints available.

name: Sacred Curse
description: After awakening from a deathlike dream, Charlotte's life turned into a terrible tale.

name: RedShip
description: Match colors to build your own spaceship! Explore space and fight alien spacecrafts while acquiring weapons and upgrading your red ship. Become the space pilot you’ve always wanted to be.

name: Hunkenstein
description: The most fearsome monsters of classic cinema are now common household pests. You're the new exterminator in town. Unlicensed, of course. Shoot, crush, burn, or mulch these physics-based ghouls, then collect the check.

name: Banzai Bat
description: Banzai Bat is an action-packed local multiplayer game for 2-4 players filled with different skins, stages and modes. Easy to learn, hard to master. Charge up your baseball bats and make your friends fly!

name: Mearstale our little item shop
description: "Mearstale" is a national strategy adventure game where you become the lord of the country and develop the town significantly. Sell ​​everything from stones to real estate, build buildings, and sometimes interact with people to explore the world within a given period of time.

name: Nuke Land
description: Nuke Land is a post-apocalyptic land that survived a nuclear war. The open world and freedom of action are all in your hands! Rob the Scrooge or become a caravan driver. Save "Rusty" or take over the gang. Explore, travel, take risks, eventually open a casino in Bordelo.

name: Find the heart
description: There are sixteen hearts hidden in sixteen worlds. They are so hidden that they can hardly be found. But if you collect all the energy balls of a world, you will get a hint when you pass. Even so, to find them, you still need to have extraordinary ideas and precise operations. Can you succeed?

name: Brave Tales
description: Brave Tales is an isometric action metroidvania where you explore the vast world of Slavic mythology and your story decisions can alter your world and reshape your destiny. You play as Ivan, who is the only one to save the village from the pure evil.

name: Chaos Uproar
description: Chaos Uproar is an FPS Single player game. An Action and Adventure packed dark atmospheric game with only basic moves and shooting skills. Analyze your enemies and plan you own move to defeat them. Powered with AI and horror ambience, this game will drip the sweat out your forehead.

name: Drone Simulator
description: Pilot a wide range of drones through varied environments in this exciting and challenging simulation game.

name: Steel Ball Race
description: Win the race, and upgrade your spirit!

name: Block Line Engineer
description: Block Line Engineer is a physics based sandbox machine building simulation game where you are challenged to create block lines that are as efficient as possible.

name: Pen Pal Princess
description: Pen Pal Princess is a queer romcom visual novel about long distance relationships and online dating. Correspond with potential suitors through letter writing, email, and DMs to convince them to rescue you from your secluded princess tower!

name: Radiotelegraphist
description: Radiotelegraphist is a game with static scene and action. Communicate with other stations by using morse code. Break code "Dielegat" from 1919.

name: Fae Populi
description: Fae Populi is a JRPG with horror and mystery elements about a little fae who faces her demons to protect her new friend from a terrible fate.

name: Hen in the Foxhouse
description: A short, silly, top down shooter filled with chicken demolition.

name: Crazy Fatties
description: Crazy Fatties is also crazy and cute Fat Brother designed the inspired game. It's a casual game of choice. Waiting for the levels of many games, the fat guys are happier to communicate together.

name: Planetary Deliver
description: If you want to learn about cities, countries and geography overall but in a fun and soothing way you should jump aboard the Planetary Deliver! Your job is to transport different packages around the world and build your own plane! You can play alone or with your friends.

name: Fairground Power Polyp Simulator
description: Always dreamed to be the operator of your favorite fairground ride? This is your change to take the control! Our Polyp Simulator will let you operate the ride completely yourself in a realistic way.

name: Yingzinue: Donghei
description: Yinznüe: donhei (original project code: the rest of life) is a round role-playing game independently developed by the independent game author Dai frog, with the revival of Hanfu as the main theme.

name: Oddware
description: Oddware is a science fiction visual novel about androids in space. You play as an android who meets other androids each with a distinct personalities. Your choices with the other androids will not only shape their personalities, but your own as well. Solve puzzles, mysteries, and your own origins.

name: WshWsha
description: Break free from the system by taking it on in a series of frantic, fast-paced, action-packed platforming challenges.

name: Orrb
description: orrb is a path building puzzle game where you explore & experiment by placing tiles. Discover different tiles, how they behave, and how you can use them to send the Orrb on its way.

name: NanoMachina
description: Challenging retro twin-stick shooter inspired by old ZX Spectrum games. Defeat all bosses and earn special power-ups before your lives run out.

name: Wonderbirds
description: Meet new Lemmings that meets Xonix. Escort dozens of nestlings to save them from the global flood and furious predators. Use your magic wisely and carefully. Coop with your friends and family to have more fun.

name: Wood Brothers Flying Colours
description: Flying Colours is an arena-based multiplayer dogfighting game for VR. The game features a highly realistic aerodynamic and physics-based flight model and some of the most exhilarating, chaotic, and hilarious air battles you can experience with your headset.

name: Global Steel
description: Global Steel is a 2d run-and-gun video game inspired by Saturday-morning cartoons from the 80s.

name: Fall Up
description: Take a leap into a lost world of mechanical wonders and embark on a hopping adventure with our adorable Labi! You need to traverse this cartoonish world with a variety of jumps and moves, meet squishy creatures and clumsy robots and reveal the secrets of this world.

name: Putty Putter
description: A grid-based movement golf game where you control a putty-like creature with the unique ability to expand and form different shapes. Do you have what it takes to stretch your brain power to the limit and conquer all mind-bending puzzles on offer?

name: Laypo Simulator
description: 'Laypo Simulator' includes multiple different game modes. At the moment they include: Laypo Country Simulator and Laypo Apocalypse Survival.

name: Gladiatori
description: Single player arena survivor. Earn ranks as you overcome your enemies to reach the top. Each enemy you kill is a step closer to your goal. Choose to spare or execute your foes as the rounds continue. For eternal glory, your rank is projected on the world stage.

name: Eco Park
description: Eco Park is a game about ecology and lo-fi hip-hop. Manage a dynamic ecosystem with creatures eating, breeding, and dying in real time. You’ll need to introduce species to increase biodiversity. Keep population sizes under control, or one species might extinguish another.

name: Steps From Above
description: Survival Experience and a capturing story

name: Time Flipper
description: Press one button to switch between timelines, this is your time-flip device, use it to find the missing people and convince them to follow you. Lead them out by switching the world state. Enemies will attack you but you carry no weapons, escape the violence by switching between timelines.

name: Outbraking
description: Outbraking is a PvPvE Co-Op Racing Game, in which you and your team can take on different missions in a vivid city to earn money and views, becoming the most viewed Outbraker!

name: Chronicles of Deeps
description: Chronicles of Deeps is Sci-fi FPS where you need to control submarines to get through story. In 2070, an event happened which left the whole world under the ocean. People separated on fractions and started to fight for resources. In 2112, some things happened which you should discover in this game.

name: Ember Crusade IV
description: Ember Crusade IV is a twin stick looter shooter roguelike where you embark on a blazing crusade to save the solar system from a demonic invasion.

name: King of the Universe
description: Help the kingdom of Kish conquer all of ancient Mesopotamia in this historical realtime strategy game. Fight all other empires in the region to earn the ancient title of Lugal Kiški: King of the Universe.

name: Goose vs. Zombies
description: Wake up, Goose, your village is invaded by zombies. Solve puzzles, open paths for exploration, defeat enemies. Hooonk!

name: Tenebrae
description: A cryptic message takes the young vampire to Tenebrae nightclub, where seven incarnations of deadly sins will stand in her way. Now she has to survive among intrigues and solve the mystery of her mother's disappearance. Which circle will you choose, Beatrice?

name: Arizona Derby 2
description: Thrilling, action-packed, racing game. Drive the world's top tuners through locations that are hidden gems across the globe. Ascend the leaderboards, race against the gangs and their allies. Tune the car into endless customizations and show up to the world. Hit the pedal, heat out the offroads!

name: Gosh A Ghost
description: Gosh A Ghost is a multiplayer turn-based strategy roguelite with RPG elements. Players hunt ghosts in a haunted mansion to eliminate all the ghosts and win the game.

name: Sword of Shadow: Revolution
description: Sword of Shadow: Revolution is an open-world role-playing game. the actions of which take place in the universe of the gods and any mistake can lead to the death of the whole world.

name: Labyrinth of the Demon King
description: Venture through the Labyrinth Of The Demon King, solving puzzles and fighting fearsome monsters in an epic quest to track down the demon who betrayed your lord and end it’s life.

name: Deep Russian Depression
description: “Deep Russian Depression” is a visual novel about people whose fate is a miserable, dreary and hopeless existence somewhere in post-Soviet Russia.

name: The Healer
description: Can you get zero kills? It's a different experience than many other Action / Rogue-Lites. You won't fight the monsters to kill them but to cure their corruption! It's all your big sister's fault and only one who can fix this mess is you!

name: Steampunk Abyss
description: Blast your way through this Bullet Hell Rougelite. Fight the automatons that guard The Abyss. Smash the wreckage for scrap to barter with the citizens of Duc Pointe. Use the experience you have gained to climb closer to the surface with each run. Your experience and a few weapons of your design....

name: Battle Arena Soccer
description: Incredible Arcade Soccer and Football Game.

name: Lux Primora
description: Lux Primora is a new take on the classic JRPG formula. Battle and solve puzzles using elemental magic, and summon the power of the Spirits to change your class and customize your playstyle on the fly.

name: Ridle
description: RIDLE is a 2D action game where you run around the stage in all directions.

name: The Ghost: Task of the Ghost Hunters
description: Always wanted to be a ghost hunter? Then you have come to the right place with The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters. You will experience the job as a ghost hunter up close and have to solve exciting puzzles.

name: Infinite Pixel Battles
description: Follow the White Rabbit and enter the matrix of Infinite Pixel Battles!

name: MelodyVerse
description: Music is your universe. Explore a customizable sandbox universe driven by music. Create beautiful fractal patterns and dazzling lightshows as you navigate this unique, audio-reactive simulation. Play your own music and tweak the visuals as you desire.

name: Auro the Bunny
description: Auro - The Bunny is a 2D platform game, in which the player will have to go through obstacles in order to catch all the fruits of the levels to win.

name: Nebula Invasion
description: Nebula Invasion was designed for those who enjoy the classic type arcade games, a spaceship shooter with great gameplay. Aliens attack many different ways from marching to dive bombing. You have the tools to fight back with a ship that can power-up with double, triple, rapid fire, or plasma cannon.

name: Insect War
description: Insect Wars is a Top Down Shooter genre game that will not leave you indifferent. Show all the rage and agility by destroying all the spiders in your path. In the end, having taken the spider lair, you will have to defend it alone from the invasion of the spider horde.

name: Meda Avi
description: 不思議なキャラたちが出てくる短編２Dアクションゲーム！ ダメージを与える方法を探して戦うボス戦のゲームとステージ毎に使える能力が増えていくゲームの2本立て！

name: Stop the Saturnians!
description: Stop the Saturnians is a shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Dodge enemy fire, destroy procedurally generated alien waves and fight massive bosses. Collect resources in the midst of combat to upgrade your ship or improve Earth's defenses. Protect yourself and the planet both!

name: ABC Flappy
description: Learn how to spell and assemble words to unlock prizes. You can trace and colour the letters of the alphabet too. Swoop deeply into this amazing adventure alongside Albert, the eager for knowledge albatross, flying through the many levels to save his silly friends while learning the alphabet.

name: Hell Bound Monsters
description: Hell Bound Monsters is a TPS survivor game where the goal is not to get us an angel of hell. Everyone goes to hell if they do something wrong. Demons come out of hell and suck your soul out. What do you think you deserve to get to heaven?

name: Alien Age
description: Alien Age is a chaotic merging single player game. As an alien, you combine and deliver a variety of resources before hopeful towns crumble to dust. Prime your engine and shine your saucer, towns are eager to see what the future holds… and they won't wait forever.

name: Subject: Relictus
description: Fight bosses and enemies to collect items and survive on the increasingly hostile planet

name: Tiny Road Interchanges
description: Create tiny road interchanges as a traffic engineer. Be as creative as possible, simulate the traffic flow and create efficient interchanges.

name: The Islands
description: An open-world survival game. Use your environment to craft items and structures. Physics based with weather and day/night. More than 50 different animals. Combat and non-combat activities fishing.

name: Winter Grae
description: Interactive FMV thriller Game that puts you inside a conspiracy to hide the truth. Hackers provide you access to deleted videos to explore an occult mystery. Unravel a coverup, look for clues to what happened to Winter Grae. Will you survive to tell the truth?

name: Haron: The Riverside
description: Explore the Riverside world, where dangerous enemies, mysterious anomalous phenomena and amazing artifacts await you. Make your own way in this unique story, make friends and defeat enemies. Choose your path and find a way out, because it will determine your fate in the end.

name: Mologa
description: Description: in 1935, the leadership of the USSR decided to build a new reservoir in one of the regions of the republic. Almost all people left villages and towns, but some refused to leave their homes.

name: Space Gliders
description: A young engineer on a quest to help their loved ones. Convince your kin to take the effort and explore distant lands.Protect your family, fight for their survival and a better future.Sky is not the limit.

name: Marmalade box
description: Marmalade box - puzzle game. The object of the game is to find and touch 2 or more blocks of the same color. Enjoy over 100 levels. There are also bonuses (crackers, bombs). More blocks can be destroyed with them. An intelligent game that will increase your concentration.

name: Killbot General
description: Satisfying real-time tactics packed in 5-minute battles. Create a customized cause and lead it to glory as its hero Killbot General in the crazy, dynamic story campaign for single-player or co-op. Simple yet deep, controller-friendly, with emphasis on strategy, not micromanagement.

name: Final Stardust
description: Final Stardust is a 2D story driven JRPG that aims to make turn-based battle systems more dynamic and strategic. Use your abilities, create new decks, seal new monsters and go through an anime-like experience!

name: Phantom Zone: Cryptophasia
description: The future is just a toe away, where supernatural phenomena are frequent. Two identical twins, Akihito and Fuyuto Shirahane. They are caught up in a strange phenomenon in Yomori City, a town where various legends swirl around them.

name: Counter Chaos
description: Counter Chaos is a simulation game where you work a growing store of your very own. However, your camera doesn't float and everything is done in first-person, without the hassle of helping hands. It's stressful, but at least you're self-employed.

name: Craftlings
description: Craftlings is a game about smart building, resource management and developing automated production chains for growth, wealth, and glory.

name: Cardstock
description: Craft a powerful deck and dive into battle against monsters in turn-based combat combined with isometric tile movement. Explore a freshly generated Crypt in every run, ensuring each playthrough will be a unique test of skill!

name: Adventure of Tuck
description: Play as Tuck in this roguelike game called Adventure of Tuck. Explore different biomes, unlock new abilities, fight different types of monsters, befriend silly characters and last but not least, fight epic bosses.

name: War In Other Space
description: War In Other Space, Role-playing game, first-person shooter, there are 15 maps in the game, smart enemies with artificial intelligence, cool Science Fiction Weapons and all this in other Space

name: Shadow Running
description: An evil cube trying to overcome all obstacles

name: Mori
description: The arcade shoot 'em up where getting angry is just a game mechanic.

name: Defensive War: Sealed Golem
description: Human VS monsters. Protect the castle! Wave-based real-time strategy (RTS). Protect your castle from attacking enemy monsters with warriors, magic, traps and turrets. The Hero and the golem, along with his companions, go looking for the cause of the appearance of monsters in the world.

name: Chemistris
description: Chemistris is a tetris-like game based on chemistry equations. Let's play chemistry! Play fire, play water, play every elements in the universe!

name: Provisional Detective
description: A first-person mystery solving game, where you try to find out what happened at Syn Archives.

name: Dino Island Adventure
description: Platform and action game set on and island with dinosaurs. Survive the hungry dinosaurs in the dangerous jungle and escape alive from the island.

name: Spooky Paths
description: In this emotional roguelite horror take control of one of the surviving children and pave your spooky path through tons of the traps. Is not that enough for you? Okay, take more travel companions with you and don't let them fall into the trap!

name: Hotel Architect
description:
Step into the chaotic 24/7 lifestyle of a hotel owner as you design and build grand hotels across the globe. Juggle the increasingly elaborate demands of disorderly guests, logistical nightmares and unexpected obstacles in Hotel Architect, the ultimate hotel construction and tycoon management game.

Advance in a career campaign mode, with a variety of objectives to complete, in order to unlock the sandbox mode across each location.

Create your own hotel from scratch or transform a dilapidated plot into a thriving business. Design the layout and hire construction workers to lay the foundations and build different facilities across multiple floors. Building requires careful planning, as it plays out in real-time, so be careful annoy, disturb or remove items your guests are using – or else they might leave a bad review!

name: OS: Memories
description: You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiosity. Understand what happened to Andy by browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS: Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.

name: Kiospoly
description: Buy land and build the best food kiosks until you form a big monopoly in the neighborhood. Become the best businessman, and bankrupt your friends through an evil capitalist strategy!

name: Madohi Shiroki no Kamikakushi
description: 《雪境迷途遇仙踪》是由日本知名美少女游戏品牌 Lump of Sugar 制作的奇幻恋爱作品。本作由知名画师萌木原文武（代表作《游魂》系列）担当游戏原画与角色设计，由多位业内资深写手共同创作剧本，由知名音乐人新井健史担当音乐制作，主题歌由方糖社当家歌姬Kicco与新锐创作型歌手逢濑晶联袂献唱。

name: Frog Fight
description: 4 Player online party battle game.

name: Boss Beek-Beekeeping Simulator
description: Boss Beek is a beekeeping game that allows you to play the role of a beekeeper! You'll have hours of entertainment building hives with the best parts you can find to house the best queens and make the best honey!

name: Across the ocean
description: In this vast sea world, you have to play an adventurer, hold the rudder with both hands, you will cross the ocean, operate as an excellent businessman, get money, there are many risks in the field of the ocean, improve the power of your ship , make yourself stronger.

name: QuaQua
description: QuaQua (that's Aqua, with a Quack!) is the addictive duck game for you. Catch the falling blocks to build terrain and keep as much water on your island as possible. Beware of falling bombs and heavy rain as the difficulty slowly climbs in this tile-matching arcade puzzle adventure.

name: RealmLess
description: Unknown reasons cause the world to collapse, and the remaining people restore order. Rebuild civilization in the waste soil and look for the past in the debris. Magic brings a turn for the better, magic brings everything.

name: Lucky Me
description: In a world devoid of originality, where talentless hacks copy your every move, you gotta use their stupidity against them to come out on top. Line up your shots, pull the trigger and survive the bullet storm in this logic-shooter game.

name: Cheftastic: Buffet Blast
description: Cheftastic: Buffet Blast is a new exciting top-down arcade shooter! Take back the Isle of Verdura from swarms of mutant vegetables and climb your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: King of Heroes
description: Follow our hero on his treacherous adventure tackling on a multitude of obstacles and battling strange and scary monsters. A new and interactive strategy game in the making built just for you and your friends!

name: The Hunter of Falkenberg
description: The Hunter of Falkenberg is a 16 bit action RPG inspired by games like "The Witcher" and "Secret of Mana". Experience a memorable story, explore a dark fantasy world, use your sword and magic to hunt wicked monsters, find epic treasures and conquer the hearts of beautiful women.

name: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning
description: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning is the first game in a trilogy called "Red's Adventure". It is a short and fun little 2D platformer. Red has to collect the chests to break each of the season's curses.

name: Bloon Rush
description: Bloon Rush is a multplayer balloon race game with up to 8 players online! The tracks are brutal and you will have to master your racing skills, while leaving bombs for your enemies! Press B to leave a bomb. Press left-click to accelerate. Do nothing to rotate. Have fun!

name: Dimension Quest Pinball
description: Dimension Quest Pinball is a bouncy mini game made to translate Dimension Quest : Altered Fates into a pinball platformer! Make use of numerous characters and powers all in the pursuit of high scores and victory over evil!

name: Moon Corp. Tower Defense
description: Build your Lunar Defense Company. Defend against invading aliens in this exhilarating Tower Defense and Business Simulator. Accept contracts, hire staff, conduct research, upgrade turrets, expand your office and protect the Moon. Aliens Down, Profits Up!

name: Haunted Stories
description: Haunted Stories is a captivating mix of horror and thriller. Experience several exciting haunted stories, each telling its own independent storyline. Each playable story contains its own secrets, game mechanics and puzzles to solve.

name: Thalamus
description: Thalamus is a First person puzzle and horror Game. You play as Rayan, an average employee that works at a surveillance company, who found out something he shouldn't have. Now with no way out and missing his memory he must team up with a caged mind to complete what he started.

name: Last Space Guardian
description: Survive 10 enemy stages! Shoot 'Em Up style, spaceship game, in pixel art and 8-bit retro music! Evolve your shot to the maximum level, use the energy bar for upgrades, and special abilities! Advance each stage by defeating Bosses and enemies to collect new skills, transformations and extra lives!

name: Last Gary
description: it's a refreshing third-person overhead shooting game. four chapters, 10 levels in each chapter, total of 40 levels. various of weapons, enemies, BOSS battles make the level challenging. also have various props, trap mechanism. This game lets you feel refreshing and the achievement of success.

name: Stand Firm
description: Interesting levels, rich gameplay, and diverse turrets. In the game, you will use your turret to defend against invading enemies.

name: Conveyance
description: A conveyor-based production and logistics sandbox including smart machines, node based conveyor belts, logic and recipe based item generation and powerful design time construction. Create and connect Miners, Splitters, Factories, Containers, Vaults and more...

name: Into the Backrooms
description: Into the Backrooms - Psychological horror in which you will experience the true experience of fear.If you’re not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas you’ll end up in the Backrooms

name: Helm or High Water
description: Helm or High Water is a VR pirate ship combat game with asymmetrical local co-op. Put your sea legs to the test and work together with a friend to control all aspects of the ship from the helm and sails to the cannons and crew.

name: Combat League
description: A modern take on Speedball; take some Rocket League, add a little World of Tanks, sprinkle some Pro Skater skills, stunts and combos and you have Combat League! Unleash modern combat vehicles, armed with powerful weapons, and roll out onto the field in this arcade elimination soccer mash-up.

name: World of Towers
description: World of Towers combines puzzles with tower defense. Design your base in order to collect all of the puzzle pieces and destroy your enemies. Create and share your own worlds on the Steam Workshop using the World of Towers World Builder

name: Push the Box
description: The game is a puzzle with boxes, will you be able to solve the puzzle.

name: Bomber Blok
description: It's time to get dirty! Equipped with your legendary jackhammer, and a bit of TNT, dig your way down into the puzzling underground caves of an hazardous alien planet abounding in marvelous gems.

name: Dungeon Castle
description: You have been summoned to an unknown castle. And you will receive one mission. Gather various voice data and approach the truth. And you have to delete the root node of the network metabus that is connected to all that truth. In that "Dungeon Castle" where you are.

name: Purry Furry Adventurry
description: Help Kat escape from her loving owner in this cute little endless runner!

name: One against the wind
description: A first-person shooter in which there are two game modes. 1. Destroy the enemy generator. 2. Steal the enemy's documents.

name: Bessarabian Nightmares
description: Help close the gates of hell, kill bosses, find keys and move on. Good luck!

name: Herbheim's Mine
description: Last warrior of the Herbheim's clan, it's your duty to defend the last family mine

name: Clive vs. Hives 2
description: Blast aliens to pieces and start a rebellion in this fast paced pixel art top down shooter with a range of unique weapons and combat abilities.

name: My Father My Son
description: Two castaways: a father and son end up on a deserted island after an unexpected storm. The sailboat cruise that was to bring them together turns into a deadly fight for survival. The characters can only count on each other.

name: Buy Me Some Soup
description: Heya! Long time no see. I just have a small -tiny- little favor to ask of you, could you buy me some soup? ...How? Well, that's for you to find out!

name: Circuit City
description: A relaxing city builder set on the tiny scale of a circuit board, where your data agents and electronic components sing a unique, procedurally-generated chiptune song for you as they work.

name: Leganda
description: Leganda is a game combining survival, exploration, industry and strategy. You buy a forgotten energy company. Develop as you explore the different islands and fight the enemies there!

name: Dots and Dashes
description: A rendition of the pen and paper classic game of Dots and Dashes. Player settable board size, with ability to to play against other players, or the program or both. Seven computer playing levels will allow players of all skill levels to enjoy the game. Leader boards are available to record wins.

name: Eletar Hero
description: Eletar Hero is a 2D platformer where you use the ability you have acquired from an ancient alien race to traverse through different maze-like levels, defeat many bosses and collect the other abilities the ancient Eletar left behind; all to stop a madman from taking over the world.

name: Dead Earth Zombies
description: Dead Earth is an open world survival game, choose what you want to do in this world, build a small base, hunt for food, survive and explore the open world, play the game your way, ohh... and try to stay off the menu.

name: Battlecaster
description: BATTLECASTER is a challenging fast paced arena roguelike. Develop mastery over relentless enemies and overcome difficult encounters. Use abilities strategically to control the ring of combat.

name: Roll Ball Adventures
description: Roll ball Adventures is an arcade game, the main character is a red ball that must overcome the traps, obstacles, and enemies of each level and get to the goal.

name: Deadly Tecknology
description: Sin descripción

name: Scholar of the Arcane Arts
description: Scholar of the Arcane Arts is a Roguelike Action RPG where every spell you cast interacts with one another. Learn new spells, solve puzzles, unlock secret dungeons, and defeat monstrous beings to save the world invaded by five Planes of magic!

name: I Am A I
description: I AM A I is a cartoony, third-person, open level design, sandbox assassin game. In case that description sounds like some corporate gaming-industry gobbledygook, imagine if Nintendo produced a Hitman game. You play as a small robot that is capable of wielding (as of right now) over 100 unique items and are tasked to assassinate one main target and execute dozens of challenges per level.

name: Elaborate Lands
description: Elaborate Lands is a relaxing strategy game with a deep building system. It combines unique gameplay mechanics with elements from 4X and city-builder games. Construct buildings, gather resources, research technologies and expand your territory. Different maps and biomes offer endless replayability.

name: Sol Raiders
description: Form your crew and prepare for blistering, team-based combat across 3 diverse maps, complete with unique objectives. The ultimate competitive virtual reality experience for up to 8 players. Fun for casual players and professionals alike.

name: Half-Life: Year of the Dragon
description: Year of the dragon is a crossover mod that brings the world of Spyro the Dragon to the Half-Life universe!

name: Crysis 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Gogte
description: In Gogte you will know a different universe from the one lived up to now, creatures that left our cruel world behind to found The Dungeon of Madness. Located in a parallel universe where no mortal can reach. They prepare the long-awaited end of the world.

name: Fallen Spirit
description: Find the surface, free the Light.

name: Destroy Simulator
description: Destroy houses and relieve stress. It is also possible to compete with everyone in the score challenge

name: Infinity BattleSoul
description: "Infinite BattleSoul" is a action Roguelite adventure game. Players can fight alone, form battle squads with friends, and use characters with different abilities to fight. Build the most suitable combination of ZhanHunQi to feel the most enjoyable combat experience brought.

name: The Leeds Devil
description: Explore the moonlit heart of the New Jersey Pine Barrens in this atmospheric, 1-bit horror game. Press into the backwoods' dark depths, where entities forgotten and strange tread in step with the spirits of the past. And above all... beware the Devil.

name: Accelerating Hotkeys
description: Try and survive working as a corporate drone while typing your anger away, making money hand over fist.

name: Mireille and Amrita, the Forest of Illusions
description: Mireille was a nun living in a small village in the mountains. One day, her sick father's illness takes a turn for the worse. To find the materials needed to cure his illness, the girl goes out on an adventure.

name: Kami Mahou
description: 跨越国家、时代和疆域的争论，英雄用传记、人民用历史堆叠论据。尽头，什么在等待着我们呢？ ——为纪念猫猫社20周年，由片冈智首部完全独立执笔，中日创作者共同制作的的“历史穿越系”长篇连载全篇，凝聚于此。

name: Relic Adventure
description: It is said that only the most brave and wise people could pass the exam, and get the treasure in the ancient relic. In the great maze, you should not only find out but also make the correct ways appear. Most challengers fails. could You Pass It?

name: Bounty Hunters
description: Bounty Hunters is a Third Person Shooter set in a Cyberpunk themed City It uses a Horde/Firefight type game system to throw waves of bad guys at the player, your job is to survive and kill the boss.

name: Attack of the Giant Crab
description: Take control of the Giant Crab and cause the maximum amount of destruction while brushing off the military's puny attempts to stop you.

name: Pk2022
description: "Pk2022"Is a 3D racing game.

name: The Last Bastion
description: The Last Bastion is a survival-management game where you lead an army of defeated soldiers across a setting inspired by medieval India. Fight overwhelming forces, manage dwindling resources and make choices with devastating consequences in a bitter struggle for survival and salvation.

name: Tyroom vs. Typing Gunner
description: Our typing gunner robot must survive in the feared Tyroom, lucky him he'll help him. Type words to teleport, explode bombs, destroy towers while you dodge and shoot robots down! Try to survive all the waves and get to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Gem Rifts
description: Ancient portals have been lying dormant, waiting for daring adventurers to travel between worlds. Your task is to lead an expedition through one of these portals, research and build defenses around it, and protect it from hostile guardian life forms.

name: Lataman
description: Lataman the punk that fights the punks because they ruined the punk.

name: Ambushed
description: Play with your team and do your best!

name: Math Game
description: Math Game is a logic game for the speed of solving simple math problems.

name: Hell Mission
